Very caring and she will work with you to help you pass! She wont just give you the grade. You do have to study and do the homework but if you stay on top of everything, youre golden!

She is fun, sweet, and engaging, and goes out of her way to make sure everyone understands the material before continuing. She always has study guides and reviews before finals, and her homework isn\'t too tough! I love her to death!

comments: Take this professor! Statistics is a very tough subject to grasp, but she makes is so understandable. She\'ll stop and help you if you have any questions. She really knows what she\'s talking about. Homework is online, quizzes are take home, tests seem hard but she gives partial credit. There are endless opportunities for EC! She made stats easy.

Homework is easy and she always gives study guides before tests!
